name: My Lady Impulsa's Asylum
description:
Explore the very recently abandoned scene of 'My Lady Impulsa's Asylum' where the experimental inmates have fled and are ransacking the nearby city. 

Developed by a team of six animation students, working to create a small game environment.

Luke Marsden - Team Lead, Programmer & Audio

Anna Brockless - Writer and Texture Artist

Jake Palandri - 3D Modeller & Programmer

Sean Dixon - 3D Modeller

Ari Dang - Concept & Texture Artist

Felicity Ellem - Concept & Texture Artist
